titles.en: Chapter 78 – Regaring the forbiddance from the name
Chapter 79 – Miscellaneous regarding the state of the Occultation

titles.ar: باب فِي تَسْمِيَةِ مَنْ رَآهُ ( عليه السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 77 – Regarding the naming of the ones who saw him<sup>asws</sup>
Chapter 78 – Regaring the forbiddance from the name

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (16/ 4)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَمَّنْ ذَكَرَهُ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ أَحْمَدَ الْعَلَوِيِّ عَنْ دَاوُدَ بْنِ الْقَاسِمِ الْجَعْفَرِيِّ قَالَ

text: سَمِعْتُ أَبَا الْحَسَنِ الْعَسْكَرِيَّ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ الْخَلَفُ مِنْ بَعْدِي الْحَسَنُ فَكَيْفَ لَكُمْ بِالْخَلَفِ مِنْ بَعْدِ الْخَلَفِ فَقُلْتُ وَ لِمَ جَعَلَنِيَ اللَّهُ فِدَاكَ قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ لَا تَرَوْنَ شَخْصَهُ وَ لَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ ذِكْرُهُ بِاسْمِهِ فَقُلْتُ فَكَيْفَ نَذْكُرُهُ فَقَالَ قُولُوا الْحُجَّةُ مِنْ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَوَاتُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَ سَلَامُهُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Muhammad, from the one who mentioned it, from Muhammad Bin Ahmad Al Alawy, from Dawood Al Qasim Al Ja’fary who said,

‘I heard Abu Al-Hassan Al-Askary<sup>asws</sup> (10<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) saying: ‘The replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>) from after me<sup>asws</sup> is Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup>, so how would it be for you all with the replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>) from after the replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>)?’ So I said, ‘And why? May I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>!’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘You all would not be seeing his<sup>asws</sup> person (physically), not would be Permissible for you all to mention him<sup>asws</sup> by his<sup>asws</sup> name’. So I said, ‘So how should we mention him<sup>asws</sup>?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘You should be saying, ‘The Divine Authority (Al-Hujjat) from the Progeny<sup>asws</sup> of Muhammad<sup>saww</sup>’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Muhammad has narrated from the person whose name he mentioned from Muhammad ibn Ahmad al-‘Alawi from Dawud ibn al-Qasim al-Ja‘fari who has said the following. “I heard abu al-Hassan al-‘Skari (a.s.) saying, ‘The succeeding Imam after me will be al-Hassan (a.s.). How will it be for you in the case of the succeeding Imam after the Imam succeeding myself?” I then asked, “ May Allah take my souls in service for your cause, why will that be so?” The Imam (a.s.) said, “You will not see his person and it will not be permissible for you to mention his name.” I then asked, “How then will we speak of him?” The Imam (a.s.) said, “Say, al-Hujja, (th Leader with Divine Authority) from the family of Muhammad (s.a).”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ( ) - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (16/ 4)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ الصَّالِحِيِّ قَالَ

text: سَأَلَنِي أَصْحَابُنَا بَعْدَ مُضِيِّ أَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَنْ أَسْأَلَ عَنِ الِاسْمِ وَ الْمَكَانِ فَخَرَجَ الْجَوَابُ إِنْ دَلَلْتُهُمْ عَلَى الِاسْمِ أَذَاعُوهُ وَ إِنْ عَرَفُوا الْمَكَانَ دَلُّوا عَلَيْهِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Muhammad, from Abu Abdullah Al Salihy who said,

Our companions asked me after the passing away of Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) that he<sup>asws</sup> was asked about the name and the place, so the answer came out: ‘If they are pointed upon his<sup>asws</sup> name, they would broadcast it, and if they know of the place, they would point (to others) upon it’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Muhammad has narrated from abu ‘Abdallah al-Salihi who has said the following. “After abu Muhammad had passed away certain individuals of our community asked me to ask about the name (of the twelfth Imam (a.s.) and his place. The following came as the reply. “If you would guide them to the name they will publicize it. If they would know the place they will show it to others.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (17/ 4)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَنِ الرَّيَّانِ بْنِ الصَّلْتِ قَالَ

text: سَمِعْتُ أَبَا الْحَسَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ وَ سُئِلَ عَنِ الْقَائِمِ فَقَالَ لَا يُرَى جِسْمُهُ وَ لَا يُسَمَّى اسْمُهُ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ja’far Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Fazzal, from Al Rayyan Bin Al Salt who said,

‘I heard Abu Al-Hassan Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup> saying, and he<sup>asws</sup> had been asked about Al-Qaim<sup>asws</sup>. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Neither will his<sup>asws</sup> body be seen, nor would his<sup>asws</sup> name be (specifically) mentioned’.
en.sarwar: 3. A number of our people has narrated from Ja’far ibn Muhammad from ibn Faddal from al-Rayyan ibn as-Salt who has said the following. “I heard abu al-Hassan al-Rida (a.s.) say, when asked al-Qa’im (the one who will establish the kingdom of All), ‘He will not be seen physically nor his very name will particularly be mentioned.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (4/17)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنِ ابْنِ رِئَابٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: صَاحِبُ هَذَا الْأَمْرِ لَا يُسَمِّيهِ بِاسْمِهِ إِلَّا كَافِرٌ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Al Hassan Bin Mahboub, from Ibn Ra’ib,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘This Divine Authority, none will name him<sup>asws</sup> by his<sup>asws</sup> name except for an Infidel’.
en.sarwar: 4. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Muhammad ibn al-Husayn from al-Hassan ibn Mahbub from ibn Ri’ab from abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.) who has said the following. “No one will pronounce the exact name of the in charge of this task (Leadership with Divine Authority), except an unbeliever.”
